title: Emotion Timeline
encodes: Longitudinal emotional trend analysis from timestamped snapshots.
domain: Emotional trajectories, inflection points, stability, week-over-week delta.
tagline: See where you've been. Know where you're headed.
description: Takes an array of timestamped emotion snapshots (from check-ins, scans, sessions) and produces trend analysis: trajectory (rising/falling/stable), inflection points, stability score (0-100), dominant family, and week-over-week delta. No LLM â€” pure algorithmic analysis.

snapshots.description: Array of { ts: number (epoch ms), hiScale: number (1-5), familyId: string }. Minimum 2 entries.

delta.description: Average Hi Scale shift (first half vs second half).

inflections.description: Significant shift points: ts, from, to, shift, direction.

weekOverWeek.description: Hi Scale change this week vs last week.
